metadata.title: CVE-2024-22258 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Spring Authorization Server versions 1.0.0 - 1.0.5, 1.1.0 - 1.1.5, 1.2.0 -1.2.2 and older unsupported versions are susceptible to a PKCE DowngradeAttack for Confidential Clients. Specifically, an application is vulnerablewhen a Confidential Client uses PKCE for the Authorization Code Grant. Anapplication is not vulnerable when a Public Client uses PKCE for theAuthorization Code Grant.

criterions.comment: spring package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
